news.name: Following fatal attack, Greece
news.description: The murder of a young football fan has led authorities in Greece to try and toughen the rules governing supporters' associations. Alkis Kambanos was stabbed and severely beaten by a gang of youths in the northern city of Thessaloniki last week.
